        Requests that usages of the specified class outside the current analysis scope be passed to the specified processor.
        Specified by:
        enqueueClassUsagesProcessor in class GlobalJavaInspectionContext
        Parameters:
        refClass - the reference graph node for the class whose usages should be processed.
        p - the processor to pass the usages to.
